revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=FiberHome |model=HG320 |revision=(China Telecom) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, analog phone gateway |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5358U |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-Y5C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5358U |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ChinaNet-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^ChinaNet-[a-fA-F]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=useradmin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui=00:0A:C2 |oui_eth=00:0A:C2 }} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/fiboom/hg320 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :"GANV5 JW220-AE" and "REV1.0" appear to be silkscreened on the board. :BCM5358 / BCM5358U based (CPU rev 00019749 / 0x19749) @500MHz :RAM appears to be a ''Hynix'' H5PS5162GFR-Y5C (64MB) :OUI: 00:0A:C2 (''FiberHome Telecommunication Technologies CO.,LTD'')
*[http://right.com.cn/forum/thread-79340-1-1.html '''Tomato''' thread on right.com.cn (CN)] The device is using a '''Legerity''' Le89810BSC (Le89810) and Le89116QVC (Le89116).
